text: Ne abakhayi baliyilwa mujahannamu mumikanda, okhula shingala balikuulakhwo, mana emiliango chakwo chiikulwe Abalindi bakhwo balireeba mbu: “ koo Abarumwa shibabetselakhwo tawe okhurula mwinywe? Nibabasoomela tsinyaali tsia Nyasaye wenyu Omulesi, nibekanyilisia okhubukanana nende inyanga yenyu ino?” baliboola mbu: “kali kario halali likhuwa lieshinyasio liatinyisibwa khubakhayi.”
